The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created the token has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已處置建立語彙基元的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationFunction" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationFunction" /> 引數為 null。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="scheduler" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scheduler" /> 引數為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid value for <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> 引數指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> 值不正確。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result produced by the continuation.
trans-unit.target: 接續作業所產生的結果類型。

trans-unit.source: A function to run when the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> completes.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 完成時要執行的函式。

trans-unit.source: When run, the delegate will be passed the completed task and the caller-supplied state object as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 當執行時，完成的工作會傳遞至委派，並以呼叫端提供狀態的物件做為引數。

trans-unit.source: An object representing data to be used by the continuation function.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示接續函式所使用的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> that will be assigned to the new continuation task.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給新接續工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Options for when the continuation is scheduled and how it behaves.
trans-unit.target: 接續工作的排程時間及其行為方式的適用選項。

trans-unit.source: This includes criteria, such as <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled" />, as well as execution options, such as <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously" />.
trans-unit.target: 這包含準則 (如 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled" />) 和執行選項 (如 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> to associate with the continuation task and to use for its execution.
trans-unit.target: 要與接續工作產生關聯且於執行時使用的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation that executes based on the specified task continuation options when the target <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> completes and returns a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立當目標 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 完成並傳回值時，會根據指定的工作接續選項來執行的接續。

trans-unit.source: The continuation receives caller-supplied state information and a cancellation token and uses the specified scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 接續會接收呼叫端提供的狀態資訊和取消語彙基元，並使用指定的排程器。

trans-unit.source: A new continuation <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的接續 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>將不會執行直到目前的工作已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the criteria specified through the `continuationOptions` parameter are not met, the continuation task will be canceled instead of scheduled.
trans-unit.target: 如果透過指定的準則`continuationOptions`參數不符合，接續工作將會取消而不是排程。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="scheduler" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scheduler" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid value for <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> 引數指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> 值不正確。

trans-unit.source: The provided <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> used to create this task.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來建立這個工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> used to create this task.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ID of the currently executing <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行之 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: An integer that was assigned by the system to the currently-executing task.
trans-unit.target: 系統指派給目前執行中工作的整數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A> is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) property that is used to get the identifier of the currently executing task from the code that the task is executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A> 是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 用來取得目前執行之工作的識別碼執行工作的程式碼的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It differs from the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Id%2A> property, which returns the identifier of a particular <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> instance.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Id%2A>屬性，傳回特定的識別項<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to retrieve the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A> value from outside the code that a task is executing, the property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試擷取<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A>從工作正在執行的程式碼之外的值，則屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note that although collisions are very rare, task identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然發生衝突情況非常罕見，工作識別碼不保證是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task that will complete after a time delay.
trans-unit.target: 建立在時間延遲之後才會完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait before completing the returned task, or -1 to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 完成所傳回工作之前等待的毫秒數；-1 為無限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task that completes after a time delay.
trans-unit.target: 建立在時間延遲之後才會完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the time delay.
trans-unit.target: 代表時間延遲的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A> method is typically used to delay the operation of all or part of a task for a specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A>方法通常用來指定的時間間隔的延遲時間的所有作業或工作的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Most commonly, the time delay is introduced:
trans-unit.target: 大多數情況下，會導入的時間延遲：

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the task, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 在開始工作，如下列範例顯示。

trans-unit.source: Sometime while the task is executing.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間時執行工作。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A> method executes as a child task within a task, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A>方法執行為工作中, 的子工作，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Note that since the task that calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A> method executes asynchronously, the parent task must wait for it to complete by using the `await` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為工作呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A>方法以非同步方式執行，父工作必須等候它完成使用`await`關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: After the specified time delay, the task is completed in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間延遲之後，在完成工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method depends on the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取決於系統時鐘。

trans-unit.source: This means that the time delay will approximately equal the resolution of the system clock if the `millisecondsDelay` argument is less than the resolution of the system clock, which is approximately 15 milliseconds on Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 這表示的時間延遲將大約等於系統時鐘的解析度如果`millisecondsDelay`引數小於大約 15 毫秒在 Windows 系統系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a simple use of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範簡單搭配<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="millisecondsDelay" /> argument is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsDelay" /> 引數小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: The time span to wait before completing the returned task, or <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1)" /> to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 完成所傳回工作之前要等待的時間範圍；<see langword="TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1)" /> 表示無限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task that completes after a specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: 建立在指定時間間隔之後完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the time delay.
trans-unit.target: 代表時間延遲的工作。

trans-unit.source: After the specified time delay, the task is completed in <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間延遲之後，在完成工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>狀態。

trans-unit.source: For usage scenarios and additional examples, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 使用方式案例和其他範例，請參閱文件<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: This method depends on the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取決於系統時鐘。

trans-unit.source: This means that the time delay will approximately equal the resolution of the system clock if the `delay` argument is less than the resolution of the system clock, which is approximately 15 milliseconds on Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 這表示的時間延遲將大約等於系統時鐘的解析度如果`delay`引數小於大約 15 毫秒在 Windows 系統系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a simple use of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範簡單搭配<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delay" /> represents a negative time interval other than <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMillseconds(-1)" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delay" /> 表示 <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMillseconds(-1)" /> 以外的負數時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="delay" /> argument's <see cref="P:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds" /> property is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delay" /> 引數的 <see cref="P:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds" /> 屬性大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait before completing the returned task, or -1 to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 完成所傳回工作之前等待的毫秒數；-1 為無限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token that will be checked prior to completing the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 將在完成傳回的工作之前檢查的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a cancellable task that completes after a time delay.
trans-unit.target: 建立在時間延遲之後才會完成的可取消工作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the time delay.
trans-unit.target: 代表時間延遲的工作。

trans-unit.source: If the cancellation token is signaled before the specified time delay, a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> exception results, and the task is completed in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的時間延遲之前, 收到信號的取消語彙基元<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>例外狀況的結果，且工作會在完成<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>狀態。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task is completed in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state once the specified time delay has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，在工作完成中<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>狀態後經過指定的時間延遲。

trans-unit.source: For usage scenarios and additional examples, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 使用方式案例和其他範例，請參閱文件<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: This method depends on the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取決於系統時鐘。

trans-unit.source: This means that the time delay will approximately equal the resolution of the system clock if the `millisecondsDelay` argument is less than the resolution of the system clock, which is approximately 15 milliseconds on Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 這表示的時間延遲將大約等於系統時鐘的解析度如果`millisecondsDelay`引數小於大約 15 毫秒在 Windows 系統系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: The following example launches a task that includes a call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method with a one second delay.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會啟動的工作，包括呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>第二個會有一個延遲方法。

trans-unit.source: Before the delay interval elapses, the token is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 延遲間隔耗盡之前，語彙基元被取消。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that, as a result, a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> is thrown, and the tasks' <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出顯示，如此一來，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>擲回，和工作的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="millisecondsDelay" /> argument is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsDelay" /> 引數小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: The task has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消這項工作。

trans-unit.source: The provided <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置所提供的 <paramref name="cancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The time span to wait before completing the returned task, or <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1)" /> to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 完成所傳回工作之前要等待的時間範圍；<see langword="TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1)" /> 表示無限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token that will be checked prior to completing the returned task.
trans-unit.target: 將在完成傳回的工作之前檢查的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a cancellable task that completes after a specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: 建立在指定時間間隔之後完成的可取消工作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the time delay.
trans-unit.target: 代表時間延遲的工作。

trans-unit.source: If the cancellation token is signaled before the specified time delay, a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> exception results, and the task is completed in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的時間延遲之前, 收到信號的取消語彙基元<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>例外狀況的結果，且工作會在完成<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>狀態。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the task is completed in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state once the specified time delay has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，在工作完成中<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>狀態後經過指定的時間延遲。

trans-unit.source: For usage scenarios and additional examples, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 使用方式案例和其他範例，請參閱文件<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.Int32%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: This method depends on the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取決於系統時鐘。

trans-unit.source: This means that the time delay will approximately equal the resolution of the system clock if the `delay` argument is less than the resolution of the system clock, which is approximately 15 milliseconds on Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 這表示的時間延遲將大約等於系統時鐘的解析度如果`delay`引數小於大約 15 毫秒在 Windows 系統系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: The following example launches a task that includes a call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method with a one-and-a-half second delay.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會啟動的工作，包括呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法和-a-1.5 秒的延遲。

trans-unit.source: Before the delay interval elapses, the token is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 延遲間隔耗盡之前，語彙基元被取消。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that, as a result, a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> is thrown, and the tasks' <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出顯示，如此一來，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>擲回，和工作的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this example includes a potential race condition: it depends on the task asynchronously executing the delay when the token is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 請注意此範例包含可能的競爭情形： 它相依於當語彙基元被取消時，以非同步方式執行延遲的工作。

trans-unit.source: Although the 1.5 second delay from the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method makes that assumption likely, it is nevertheless possible that the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method could return before the token is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 1.5 秒延遲，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法讓可能假設，不過可能是，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Delay%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法無法傳回之前語彙基元被取消。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="delay" /> represents a negative time interval other than <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMillseconds(-1)" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delay" /> 表示 <see langword="TimeSpan.FromMillseconds(-1)" /> 以外的負數時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="delay" /> argument's <see cref="P:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds" /> property is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="delay" /> 引數的 <see cref="P:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds" /> 屬性大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The task has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消這項工作。

trans-unit.source: The provided <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置所提供的 <paramref name="cancellationToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface because internally it uses resources that also implement <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>類別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，因為它會在內部使用，也會實作資源<xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: However, particularly if your app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] or later, there is no need to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose%2A> unless performance or scalability testing indicates that, based on your usage patterns, your app's performance would be improved by disposing of tasks.
trans-unit.target: 不過，特別是當您的應用程式的目標[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]或更新版本中，您就不必呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose%2A>除非效能或延展性測試指出，根據您使用模式，您的應用程式提升的效能會透過處置的工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Do I need to dispose of Tasks?](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2012/03/25/10287435.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[我需要處置的工作？](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2012/03/25/10287435.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。

trans-unit.source: The task is not in one of the final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: 工作不是下列其中一個最終狀態：<see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />、<see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether this method is being called due to a call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示是否會因為呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose" /> 而呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />, releasing all of its unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 處置 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />，並釋放它的所有 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface because internally it uses resources that also implement <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>類別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，因為它會在內部使用，也會實作資源<xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: However, particularly if your app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] or later, there is no need to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose%2A> unless performance or scalability testing indicates that, based on your usage patterns, your app's performance would be improved by disposing of tasks.
trans-unit.target: 不過，特別是當您的應用程式的目標[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]或更新版本中，您就不必呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Dispose%2A>除非效能或延展性測試指出，根據您使用模式，您的應用程式提升的效能會透過處置的工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Do I need to dispose of Tasks?](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2012/03/25/10287435.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[我需要處置的工作？](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2012/03/25/10287435.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。

trans-unit.source: The task is not in one of the final states: <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" />, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />.
trans-unit.target: 工作不是下列其中一個最終狀態：<see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion" />、<see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of the members of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> class, this method is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的成員<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />類別，這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> that caused the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> to end prematurely.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 不當結束的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> completed successfully or has not yet thrown any exceptions, this will return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 順利完成，或未擲回任何例外狀況，則這會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> that caused the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> to end prematurely.
trans-unit.target: 導致 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 不當結束的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: Tasks that throw unhandled exceptions store the resulting exception and propagate it wrapped in a <xref:System.AggregateException> in calls to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A> or in accesses to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 儲存產生的例外狀況擲回未處理的例外狀況的工作，以及傳播包裝在<xref:System.AggregateException>中呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A>或存取<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions not observed by the time the task instance is garbage collected will be propagated on the finalizer thread.
trans-unit.target: 工作執行個體是記憶體回收的時間未觀察到任何例外狀況會在完成項執行緒上傳播。

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see [Exception Handling (Task Parallel Library)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[例外狀況處理 （工作平行程式庫）](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to factory methods for creating and configuring <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> and <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Factory 方法的存取，這些 Factory 方法用於建立及設定 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A factory object that can create a variety of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> and <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Factory 物件，可以建立各種不同的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a default instance of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.%23ctor?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回預設執行個體<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>等同於呼叫的無參數所建立的類別<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.%23ctor?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: It has the following property values:
trans-unit.target: 它有下列屬性值：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: `null`或 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最常見用法是以建立並啟動新工作的單一呼叫中<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provides the easiest way to create a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object with default configuration values.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法提供最簡單的方式建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>使用預設組態值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A> property to make two calls to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用靜態<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A>屬性使兩個呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first populates an array with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second populates an array with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory.
trans-unit.target: 第一個填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄中的檔案名稱陣列，而第二個擴展使用者 MyDocuments 目錄的子目錄名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the two arrays after the first two tasks have completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，這個方法會顯示兩個陣列中的檔案和目錄的數目的相關資訊前, 兩個工作完成執行之後。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token with which to complete the task.
trans-unit.target: 可用來完成工作的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that's completed due to cancellation with a specified cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 建立以指定的取消語彙基元取消而完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: The canceled task.
trans-unit.target: 取消的工作。

trans-unit.source: Cancellation has not been requested for <paramref name="cancellationToken" />; its <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 並未針對 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 要求取消；其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result returned by the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作傳回的結果的類型。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token with which to complete the task.
trans-unit.target: 可用來完成工作的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that's completed due to cancellation with a specified cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 建立以指定的取消語彙基元取消而完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The canceled task.
trans-unit.target: 取消的工作。

trans-unit.source: Cancellation has not been requested for <paramref name="cancellationToken" />; its <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 並未針對 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 要求取消；其 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception with which to complete the task.
trans-unit.target: 可用來完成工作的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that has completed with a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立以指定例外狀況完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: The faulted task.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤的工作。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property is <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> and whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property contains `exception`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>物件，其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>，且<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性包含`exception`。

trans-unit.source: The method is commonly used when you immediately know that the work that a task performs will throw an exception before executing a longer code path.
trans-unit.target: 當您立即知道工作執行的工作將會擲回的例外狀況，再執行較長的程式碼路徑時，通常會使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromException%60%601%28System.Exception%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromException%60%601%28System.Exception%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result returned by the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作傳回的結果的類型。

trans-unit.source: The exception with which to complete the task.
trans-unit.target: 可用來完成工作的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that's completed with a specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 建立以指定例外狀況完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The faulted task.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤的工作。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property is <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> and whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property contains `exception`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件，其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>，且<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性包含`exception`。

trans-unit.source: The method is commonly used when you immediately know that the work that a task performs will throw an exception before executing a longer code path.
trans-unit.target: 當您立即知道工作執行的工作將會擲回的例外狀況，再執行較長的程式碼路徑時，通常會使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將提供說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會計算每個名稱會當做命令列引數傳遞的目錄中的檔案中的位元組數的命令列公用程式。

trans-unit.source: Rather than executing a longer code path that instantiates a <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object and retrieves the value of its <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for each file in the directory, the example simply calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromException%60%601%28System.Exception%29> method to create a faulted task if a particular subdirectory does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 而不是執行較長的程式碼路徑可具現化<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件，並擷取的值及其<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目錄中的每個檔案的屬性，此範例只會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromException%60%601%28System.Exception%29>建立發生錯誤的工作，如果特定的方法子目錄不存在。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result returned by the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作傳回的結果的類型。

trans-unit.source: The result to store into the completed task.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存到完成的工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that's completed successfully with the specified result.
trans-unit.target: 建立已成功完成且具有指定之結果的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The successfully completed task.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `result` and whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property is <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件，其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是`result`，且<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>。

trans-unit.source: The method is commonly used when the return value of a task is immediately known without executing a longer code path.
trans-unit.target: 不會執行較長的程式碼路徑立即知道工作的傳回值時，通常使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將提供說明。

trans-unit.source: To create a Task object that does not return a value, retrieve the Task object from the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CompletedTask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立沒有傳回值的工作物件，擷取工作物件，從<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CompletedTask%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會計算每個名稱會當做命令列引數傳遞的目錄中的檔案中的位元組數的命令列公用程式。

trans-unit.source: Rather than executing a longer code path that instantiates a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object and retrieves the value of its <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for each file in the directory, the example simply calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult%2A> method to create a task whose <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is zero (0) if a directory has no files.
trans-unit.target: 而不是執行較長的程式碼路徑可具現化<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件，並擷取的值及其<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Length%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目錄中的每個檔案的屬性，此範例只會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult%2A>方法來建立工作的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Result%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性為零 (0)，如果沒有檔案的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets an awaiter used to await this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來等候這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 的 awaiter。

trans-unit.source: An awaiter instance.
trans-unit.target: awaiter 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for compiler use rather than for use in application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供編譯器使用，而不是應用程式程式碼中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets an ID for this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 執行個體的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that is assigned by the system to this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 系統指派給這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 執行個體的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Task IDs are assigned on-demand and do not necessarily represent the order in which task instances are created.
trans-unit.target: 工作 Id 指派隨並不一定代表哪一項工作中建立執行個體的順序。

trans-unit.source: Note that although collisions are very rare, task identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然發生衝突情況非常罕見，工作識別碼不保證是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: To get the task ID of the currently executing task from within code that that task is executing, use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得該工作正在執行的程式碼中，將從目前執行之工作的工作識別碼，請使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CurrentId%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> instance has completed execution due to being canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 執行個體是否因取消才完成執行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the task has completed due to being canceled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作是由於取消而完成則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> will complete in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>會完成<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>狀態任何下列情況：

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A> was marked for cancellation before the task started executing,
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A>在工作開始執行時之前, 已標示為取消

trans-unit.source: The task acknowledged the cancellation request on its already signaled <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A> by throwing an <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> that bears the same <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>.
trans-unit.target: 工作確認取消要求，在其已收到信號<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A>藉由擲回<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>，具有相同<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>。

trans-unit.source: The task acknowledged the cancellation request on its already signaled <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A> by calling the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A> method on the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>.
trans-unit.target: 工作確認取消要求，在其已收到信號<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken%2A>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A>方法<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCanceled%2A> property does not block the calling thread until the task has completed.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCanceled%2A>屬性不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到工作完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 是否已完成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the task has completed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作已完成則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCompleted%2A> will return `true` when the task is in one of the three final states: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCompleted%2A> 會傳回`true`當工作處於三種最終狀態的其中一個： <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>， <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>，或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCompleted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property does not block the calling thread until the task has completed.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsCompleted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到工作完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> completed due to an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 是否因未處理的例外狀況才完成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the task has thrown an unhandled exception; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作擲回未處理的例外狀況則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsFaulted%2A> is `true`, the task's <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> is equal to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property will be non-null.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsFaulted%2A>是`true`，工作的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>等於<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性為非 null。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsFaulted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property does not block the calling thread until the task has completed.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.IsFaulted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到工作完成為止。

trans-unit.source: Queues the specified work to run on the ThreadPool and returns a task or <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> handle for that work.
trans-unit.target: 將指定在 ThreadPool 執行工作排入佇列，並傳回該工作的工作或 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A> method provides a set of overloads that make it easy to start a task by using default values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A>方法提供一組多載可讓您輕鬆地使用預設值啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: It is a lightweight alternative to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 它是輕量級替代方案<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: The work to execute asynchronously
trans-unit.target: 要以非同步方式執行的工作

trans-unit.source: Queues the specified work to run on the thread pool and returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> object that represents that work.
trans-unit.target: 將指定在執行緒集區執行工作排入佇列，並傳回代表該工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the work queued to execute in the ThreadPool.
trans-unit.target: 表示已進入佇列要在 ThreadPool 中執行之工作 (work) 的工作 (task)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A> method allows you to create and execute a task in a single method call and is a simpler alternative to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A>方法可讓您建立和執行單一方法呼叫中的工作，簡單的替代方案<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It creates a task with the following default values:
trans-unit.target: 它會建立工作以下列的預設值：

trans-unit.source: Its cancellation token is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 它的取消語彙基元是<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CreationOptions%2A> property value is <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CreationOptions%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It uses the default task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用預設工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `ShowThreadInfo` method that displays the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`ShowThreadInfo`顯示方法<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前執行緒。

trans-unit.source: It is called directly from the application thread, and is called from the <xref:System.Action> delegate passed to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接從執行緒中呼叫應用程式，並從呼叫<xref:System.Action>傳遞至委派<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression to define the code that the task is to execute.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是類似於上一個，，不同之處在於它使用 lambda 運算式來定義的工作是將執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The examples show that the asynchronous task executes on a different thread than the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: 範例將示範非同步工作是在主應用程式執行緒以外的不同執行緒上執行。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A> method ensures that the task completes and displays its output before the application ends.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A>方法可確保在工作完成，也會顯示應用程式結束前的其輸出。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is possible that the `Main` method will complete before the task finishes.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它有可能，`Main`方法將在工作完成之前完成。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: It defines an array of directory names and starts a separate task to retrieve the file names in each directory.
trans-unit.target: 它定義的目錄名稱陣列，並啟動個別的工作，以擷取每個目錄中的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: All tasks write the file names to a single <xref:System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 所有工作的檔案名稱都寫入單一<xref:System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29> method to ensure that all tasks have completed, and then displays a count of the total number of file names written to the <xref:System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29>方法，以確保所有工作完成，並接著會顯示檔案名稱寫入總數的計數<xref:System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> parameter was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The work to execute asynchronously
trans-unit.target: 要以非同步方式執行的工作

trans-unit.source: Queues the specified work to run on the thread pool and returns a proxy for the task returned by <paramref name="function" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定在執行緒集區執行的工作排入佇列，並傳回 <paramref name="function" /> 所傳回之工作的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents a proxy for the task returned by <paramref name="function" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <paramref name="function" /> 所傳回工作之 Proxy 的工作。

trans-unit.source: For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="function" /> parameter was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="function" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The work to execute asynchronously
trans-unit.target: 要以非同步方式執行的工作

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token that can be used to cancel the work
trans-unit.target: 可以用來取消工作的取消語彙基元

trans-unit.source: Queues the specified work to run on the thread pool and returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> object that represents that work.
trans-unit.target: 將指定在執行緒集區執行工作排入佇列，並傳回代表該工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token allows the work to be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元允許取消工作。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the work queued to execute in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 表示已進入佇列，並要在執行緒集區中執行之工作 (work) 的工作 (task)。

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is requested before the task begins execution, the task does not execute.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作開始執行之前，已要求取消，則不會執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Instead it is set to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state and throws a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 而是設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>狀態，則擲回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method is a simpler alternative to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法是簡單的替代方案<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It creates a task with the following default values:
trans-unit.target: 它會建立工作以下列的預設值：

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CreationOptions%2A> property value is <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CreationOptions%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It uses the default task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用預設工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method to create a task that iterates the files in the C:\Windows\System32 directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法建立逐一查看 C:\Windows\System32 目錄中的檔案的工作。

trans-unit.source: The lambda expression calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add information about each file to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> object.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 運算式呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將每個檔案的相關資訊<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: Each detached nested task invoked by the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 每個中斷連結的巢狀的工作所叫用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>迴圈會檢查的取消語彙基元的狀態，並在要求取消，如果呼叫<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method throws an <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會擲回<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>進行處理的例外狀況`catch`封鎖呼叫執行緒呼叫時<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.target: 它會使用預設工作排程器。

trans-unit.source: The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會計算文字在文字檔案，代表已發行活頁簿中的近似數目。

trans-unit.source: Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 每項工作負責開啟檔案，以非同步的方式，讀取其完整內容，而且使用規則運算式的計算字數統計。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29> method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29>呼叫方法，請確定所有工作已都完成之後，主控台中顯示每本書的字數。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式`\p{P}*\s+`比對零個、 一個或多個標點符號字元後面接著一個或多個空格字元。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設的相符項目總數等於大約字數。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Task(TResult)" /> that represents the work queued to execute in the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Task(TResult)" />，代表已排入佇列要在執行緒集區中執行的工作。

trans-unit.source: If cancellation is requested before the task begins execution, the task does not execute.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作開始執行之前，已要求取消，則不會執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Instead it is set to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state and throws a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 而是設定為<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>狀態，則擲回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A>方法是簡單的替代方案<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates 20 tasks that will loop until a counter is incremented to a value of 2 million.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立將迴圈，直到計數器就會遞增為 2 百萬個值的 20 任務。

trans-unit.source: When the first 10 tasks reach 2 million, the cancellation token is cancelled, and any tasks whose counters have not reached 2 million are cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 當前 10 個工作都達到 2 百萬個時，取消語彙基元被取消，並會取消其計數器未達到 2 百萬個的任何工作。

trans-unit.source: The example shows possible output.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範可能的輸出。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A> property to examine exceptions, the example iterates all tasks to determine which have completed successfully and which have been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A>屬性可檢查例外狀況，此範例會逐一查看所有工作，以決定其已成功完成，這都已取消。

trans-unit.source: For those that have completed, it displays the value returned by the task.
trans-unit.target: 對於已完成，它會顯示工作所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Because cancellation is cooperative, each task can decide how to respond to cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 取消是合作式的因為每個工作可以決定如何回應取消。

trans-unit.source: The following example is like the first, except that, once the token is cancelled, tasks return the number of iterations they've completed rather than throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是類似第一，只不過在語彙基元被取消，工作會恢復它們已經完成而不是擲回例外狀況的反覆項目數。

trans-unit.source: The example still must handle the <xref:System.AggregateException> exception, since any tasks that have not started when cancellation is requested still throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 此範例仍然必須處理<xref:System.AggregateException>例外狀況，因為尚未啟動時，在要求取消的任何工作仍會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="function" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="function" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The task has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消這項工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> associated with <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> 已經處置。

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> synchronously on the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 上同步執行 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> synchronously on the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 上同步執行 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, tasks are executed asynchronously on a thread pool thread and do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，工作會在執行緒集區執行緒上非同步執行，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Tasks executed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously> method are associated with the current <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> and are run on the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫執行的工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously>方法會關聯到目前<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>且在呼叫執行緒上執行。

trans-unit.source: If the target scheduler does not support running this task on the calling thread, the task will be scheduled for execution on the scheduler, and the calling thread will block until the task has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標排程器不支援呼叫的執行緒上執行這項工作，以便在排程器上執行排定工作時，會和呼叫的執行緒會封鎖直到工作完成執行。

trans-unit.source: Even though the task runs synchronously, the calling thread should still call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A> to handle any exceptions that the task might throw.
trans-unit.target: 即使工作是以同步方式執行，仍應該呼叫呼叫執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A>處理工作可能會擲回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information on exception handling, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需例外狀況處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: Tasks executed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A> method are instantiated by calling a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫執行的工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A>藉由呼叫的方法會具現化<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The task to be run synchronously must be in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行工作必須在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Created>狀態。

trans-unit.source: A task may be started and run only once.
trans-unit.target: 工作可能會啟動，以及僅執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Any attempts to schedule a task a second time results in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 排程工作中例外狀況的第二個階段結果的任何嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares a task executed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A> method with one executed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較工作，藉由呼叫執行<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A>具有一個以非同步方式執行方法。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, the tasks execute identical lambda expressions that display the task ID and the ID of the thread on which the task is running.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，工作執行的顯示工作識別碼和執行緒的識別碼相同的 lambda 運算式上執行工作。

trans-unit.source: The task calculates the sum of the integers between 1 and 1,000,000.
trans-unit.target: 工作計算介於 1 到 1000000 之間的整數的總和。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, the task executed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A> method runs on the application thread, while the asynchronous task does not.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出所示，執行此工作，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A>應用程式執行緒，而非同步工作沒有執行的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 執行個體已經過處置。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 不是處於有效的啟動狀態。

trans-unit.source: The scheduler on which to attempt to run this task inline.
trans-unit.target: 排程器，要嘗試在其上以內嵌方式執行這個工作。

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> synchronously on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> provided.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 上同步執行 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Tasks executed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A> method are instantiated by calling a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫執行的工作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A>藉由呼叫的方法會具現化<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The task to be run synchronously must be in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行工作必須在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Created>狀態。

trans-unit.source: A task may be started and run only once.
trans-unit.target: 工作可能會啟動，以及僅執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Any attempts to schedule a task a second time results in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 排程工作中例外狀況的第二個階段結果的任何嘗試。

trans-unit.source: If the target scheduler does not support running this task on the current thread, the task will be scheduled for execution on the scheduler, and the current thread will block until the task has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標排程器不支援目前的執行緒上執行這項工作，以便在排程器上執行排定工作時，會和目前的執行緒會封鎖直到工作完成執行。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the calling thread does not need to call a method such as <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A> to ensure that the task has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，呼叫的執行緒不會不需要呼叫方法，例如<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A>以確保工作已完成執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information on exception handling for task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關工作作業的例外狀況處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.target: 啟動 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />，並排定它在目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> 執行。

trans-unit.source: A task may be started and run only once.

trans-unit.source: Any attempts to schedule a task a second time will result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 第二次排定工作的任何嘗試會導致例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> is used to execute a task that has been created by calling one of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> constructors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>用來執行的工作，透過呼叫其中一個已建立<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do this when you need to separate the task's creation from its execution, such as when you conditionally execute tasks that you've created.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您這樣做時，您需要將從其執行，例如當您有條件地執行工作所建立的工作的建立。

trans-unit.source: For the more common case in which you don't need to separate task instantiation from execution, we recommend that you call an overload of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 較常見的情況，您不需要個別執行的工作具現化，我們建議您呼叫的多載<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For information on handling exceptions thrown by task operations, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md).
trans-unit.target: 處理工作的作業所擲回的例外狀況的資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.%23ctor%28System.Action%29> constructor to instantiate a new <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object that displays its task ID and managed thread ID and then executes a loop.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.%23ctor%28System.Action%29>建構函式來具現化新<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>物件，以顯示其識別碼與 managed 的執行緒識別碼的工作，並接著會執行迴圈。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> method to execute the task.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>方法才能執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Since this is a console app, the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A> method is necessary to prevent the app from terminating before the task finishes execution.
trans-unit.target: 由於這是主控台應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A>方法是為了防止應用程式終止之前執行的工作完成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> with which to associate and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個工作產生關聯，並用於執行這個工作的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: Starts the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />, scheduling it for execution to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />.
